00028 MosaicClass_t MosaicClassNeg(MosaicClass_t val) {
00029   assert(val<MCLASS__LAST);
00030 
00031   switch (val) {
00032   case MCLASS_n10:
00033     return MCLASS_p10;
00034     break;
00035   case MCLASS_n07:
00036     return MCLASS_p07;
00037     break;
00038   case MCLASS_n05:
00039     return MCLASS_p05;
00040     break;
00041   case MCLASS_n03:
00042     return MCLASS_p03;
00043     break;
00044   case MCLASS_00:
00045     return MCLASS_00;
00046     break;
00047   case MCLASS_p03:
00048     return MCLASS_n03;
00049     break;
00050   case MCLASS_p05:
00051     return MCLASS_n05;
00052     break;
00053   case MCLASS_p07:
00054     return MCLASS_n07;
00055     break;
00056   case MCLASS_p10:  // +1.0
00057     return MCLASS_n10;
00058     break;
00059   default:
00060     assert(0);
00061     return MCLASS_NONE;
00062     break;
00063   }
00064   assert(0);
00065   return MCLASS_NONE;
00066 }
00067 
00068 float MosaicClassToFloat_array[]=
00069   {0.0, //
00070    -1.0, -0.7, -0.5, -0.3,
00071    0.0,
00072    +0.3, +0.5, +0.7, +1.0};
00073                                   
00074 float MosaicClassToFloat(MosaicClass_t val) {
00075 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG
00076   if (!(val<MCLASS__LAST)) {
00077     printf("### MosaicClassToFloat: fail! val=%d\n",val);
00078     return -99.0;
00079   }
00080 #endif
00081   assert(val<MCLASS__LAST);
00082   return MosaicClassToFloat_array[val];
00083 };
00084

00264 /**
00265  * Compare function.
00266  * @param that - A reference to an instance of this class.
00267  * @param iCompareCode - The code to switch on when doing compares. (Each code is a different compare.)
00268  * @return - int value. (-1 if *this < that, 0 if *this == that, 1 if *this > that)
00269 */
00270 int CNSegment::compareTo(CNSegment& that, int iCompareCode)
00271 {
00272   int iCompareResult = 0;
00273   switch (iCompareCode) {
00274   case 0:
00275     iCompareResult = m_strSegmentName.compareTo(that.m_strSegmentName, 0);
00276     break;
00277   case 1:
00278     iCompareResult = AffxArray<char>::compare(m_cChromosome, that.m_cChromosome);
00279     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00280       iCompareResult = AffxArray<int>::compare(m_iStartPosition, that.m_iStartPosition);
00281     }
00282     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00283       iCompareResult = AffxArray<int>::compare(m_iEndPosition, that.m_iEndPosition);
00284     }
00285     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00286       iCompareResult = m_strSegmentName.compareTo(that.m_strSegmentName, 0);
00287     }
00288     break;
00289   }
00290   return iCompareResult;
00291 }

00298 /**
00299  * @brief Return the segment type associated with the specified name
00300  * @param const AffxString& - The specified name
00301  * @return int - The segment type
00302  */
00303 int CNSegment::getSegmentType(const AffxString& strName)
00304 {
00305   // Non segment analysis (Needed for analysis ordering).
00306   if (strName == "log2-ratio") {
00307     return -14;
00308   } else if (strName == "log2-ratio-cyto2") {
00309     return -13;
00310   } else if (strName == "gaussian-smooth") {
00311     return -12;
00312   } else if (strName == "kernel-smooth") {
00313     return -11;
00314   } else if (strName == "cn-cyto2") {
00315     return -10;
00316   } else if (strName == "cn-snp7") {
00317     return -9;
00318   } else if (strName == "cn-state") {
00319     return -8;
00320   } else if (strName == "cn-gender") {
00321     return -7;
00322   } else if (strName == "cn-cyto2-gender") {
00323     return -6;
00324   } else if (strName == "genotype") {
00325     return -5;
00326   } else if (strName == "allelic-difference-CytoScan") {
00327     return -4;
00328   } else if (strName == "allelic-difference") {
00329     return -3;
00330   } else if (strName == "lohCytoScan") {
00331     return -2;
00332   } else if (strName == "loh") {
00333     return -1;
00334   }
00335   //cychp
00336   else if (strName == "cn-segment") {
00337     return 1;
00338   } else if (strName == "loh-segment") {
00339     return 2;
00340   } else if (strName == "loh-cyto2") {
00341     return 3;
00342   } else if (strName == "cn-neutral-loh") {
00343     return 4;
00344   } else if (strName == "normal-diploid") {
00345     return 5;
00346   } else if (strName == "mosaicism") {
00347     return 6;
00348   } else if (strName == "no-call") {
00349     return 7;
00350   }
00351   // Non segment analysis (Needed for analysis ordering).
00352   else if (strName == "allele-peaks") {
00353     return 8;
00354   }
00355   // familial
00356   else if (strName == "genotype-concordance") {
00357     return 11;
00358   } else if (strName == "genotype-discordance") {
00359     return 12;
00360   } else if (strName == "cn-neutral-loh-concordance") {
00361     return 13;
00362   } else if (strName == "cn-loss-loh-concordance") {
00363     return 14;
00364   } else if (strName == "hetero-upd") {
00365     return 15;
00366   } else if (strName == "iso-upd") {
00367     return 16;
00368   } else if (strName == "hemizygous-parent-of-origin") {
00369     return 17;
00370   } else if (strName == "denovo-cn") {
00371     return 18;
00372   } else {
00373     throw(Except("Cannot find segment type for analysis name " + strName));
00374   }
00375   return 0;
00376 }
00377 
00378 /**
00379  * @brief Return the segment type string associated with the specified segment type
00380  * @param short - The specified segment type
00381  * @return AffxString - The segment type string
00382  */
00383 AffxString CNSegment::getSegmentTypeString(short nSegmentType)
00384 {
00385   switch (nSegmentType) {
00386     // cychp
00387   case 1: return "CN";
00388   case 2: return "LOH";
00389   case 3: return "LOH";
00390   case 4: return "CNNeutralLOH";
00391   case 5: return "NormalDiploid";
00392   case 6: return "Mosaicism";
00393   case 7: return "NoCall";
00394     // familial
00395   case 11: return "GenotypeConcordance";
00396   case 12: return "GenotypeDiscordance";
00397   case 13: return "CNNeutralLOHConcordance";
00398   case 14: return "CNLossLOHConcordance";
00399   case 15: return "HeteroUPD";
00400   case 16: return "IsoUPD";
00401   case 17: return "HemizygousParentOfOrigin";
00402   case 18: return "DenovoCopyNumber";
00403   }
00404   return "Unknown";
00405 }
00406 
00407 AffxString CNSegment::getSegmentTypeString()
00408 {
00409   return getSegmentTypeString(m_nSegmentType);
00410 }

00413 CNSegmentArray::CNSegmentArray() {}
00414 CNSegmentArray::~CNSegmentArray()
00415 {
00416   deleteAll();
00417 }
00418 int CNSegmentArray::getSegmentCount(int iType)
00419 {
00420   int iCount = 0;
00421   for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < getCount()); iIndex++) {
00422     CNSegment* p = getAt(iIndex);
00423     if (p->getSegmentType() == iType) {
00424       iCount++;
00425     }
00426   }
00427   return iCount;
00428 }
00429 
00430 int CNSegmentArray::writeToTsv(const std::string& tsv_path) 
00431 {
00432   Verbose::out(1,std::string("CNSegmentArray::writeToTsv: ")+tsv_path);
00433 
00434   affx::TsvFile tsv;
00435   tsv.defineFile("idx\t"
00436                  "index-start\t"
00437                  "index-end\t"
00438                  "index-size\t"
00439                  "type\t"
00440                  //"chr\t" "base-start\t" "base-end\t"
00441                  "mixture\t"
00442                  "call\t"
00443                  "confidence\t"
00444                  "calibrated-cn");
00445   // simple headers.
00446   tsv.writeTsv_v1(tsv_path);
00447 
00448   //
00449   int i_max=getCount();
00450   for (int i=0;i<i_max;i++) {
00451     CNSegment* seg = getAt(i);
00452     int cidx=0;
00453     tsv.set(0,cidx++,i);
00454     tsv.set(0,cidx++,seg->getStartIndex());
00455     tsv.set(0,cidx++,seg->getEndIndex());
00456     tsv.set(0,cidx++,seg->getIndexLen());
00457     tsv.set(0,cidx++,seg->getSegmentType());
00458     //tsv.set(0,cidx++,seg->getChromosome());
00459     //tsv.set(0,cidx++,seg->getStartPosition());
00460     //tsv.set(0,cidx++,seg->getEndPosition());
00461     tsv.set(0,cidx++,MosaicClassToFloat(seg->getMixture()));
00462     tsv.set(0,cidx++,seg->getCall());
00463     tsv.set(0,cidx++,seg->getConfidence());
00464     tsv.set(0,cidx++,seg->getCalibratedCN());
00465     //
00466     tsv.writeLevel(0);
00467   }
00468   tsv.close();
00469   //
00470   return 0;
00471 }
